Detailed Description

The class which handles all downloads of required files.

Member Function Documentation

bool Fetcher::Fetch ( string  fileLocation,
string  storageDirectory,
string  checksum = "",
bool  force = false 
) const
Parameters:
fileLocation - the remote location of the file
storageDirectory - the directory to hold the local copy of the file
checksum - string to check md5sum against, check disabled if ""
force - if true, the file will be fetched even if a local copy exists
Returns:
false if file cannot be downloaded or the file exists and cannot be forcibly removed
true if successful or fle already exists

Downloads the file from the specifed location and stores it in the storage directory. If the file is already in the storage directory, it will only be downloaded if force is true.
